title: Save the Grymforge Gnomes
content:

Check on the survivors

We cleared the cave-in. We should check for survivors.

Save the Grymforge Gnomes Walkthrough

You can get this quest at Myconid colony. Save the wounded gnome (give her an antidote), to get BOOTS OF SPEED. Talk to Lunkbug or Barcus Wroot at the Dig site, in Grymforge. If you helped Thulla previously, you can tell her s
